title: Electric field between the plates of a capacitor

content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the electric field inside the surface of the plate a short distance off the center of the surface plate?

choices.label: <math alttext="E equals the fraction Q over 2 epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="E equals the fraction Q over epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="E equals the fraction 2 Q over epsilon sub 0, end sub, A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="E equals the fraction 4 Q over epsilon sub 0, end sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mi>A</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
